Subject: Familiar Feelings
Message-ID: <99g9qt+tqcm@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1407

From: whyteboy08@...

FireBlade crawled out of the destrucction that used to e his 
ship. "This is new world to me...the geological features are not in 
my memory bank" He walked forward and looked around at all the poles 
made of strange carbon material instead of metal. "How long has it 
been since I last stood."
He walked back to his old ship and pulled from the scrap heap the 
ships control board..He split the metal with his blade like cutting 
butter....He removed the ships memory chip and inserted into a slot 
in his arm...Evrythng came back to him and much more...It showed his 
makers in a battle with FireBlade then succesfully powering him down 
and putting him into a ship. The ship showed him flying for many 
years before crash landing on this bizzarre planet. His ship had sent 
out a scout drone and prepared FireBlade for this world.  But 
something was wrong...he felt something...something he hasn't felt 
since back on Cybertron when he was with his faction..To him this 
feeling was a blip on a radar screen...showing him the way...The blip 
comes from a bot...but this bot was thought dead long ago by 
FireBlade...And this bot FireBlade is the sworn protector of...THE 
BODYGUARD....He started running forward covering ground quickly 
because of his enourmous stride then in midstride he transformed into 
a giant Flame throwing tank...He headed toward the blip like it was a 
life or death situation
